com.hp.autonomy.iod.client.api.textindexing

Class AddToTextIndexJobService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hp.autonomy.iod.client.job.AbstractJobService
      • com.hp.autonomy.iod.client.api.textindexing.AddToTextIndexJobService

  • public class AddToTextIndexJobService
extends AbstractJobService
    Service for managing jobs ids from the AddToTextIndex API. The destroy method should be called when the service is no longer needed.

    • Method Detail

      • addJsonToTextIndex

        public void addJsonToTextIndex(String apiKey,
                      Documents<?> documents,
                      String index,
                      Map<String,Object> params,
                      IodJobCallback<AddToTextIndexResponse> callback)
                        throws IodErrorException
        Index JSON documents into IDOL OnDemand
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        documents - A collection of objects to convert to JSON
        index - The index to add to
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        callback - Callback that will be called with the response
        Throws:
        IodErrorException - If an error occurs indexing the documents

      • addUrlToTextIndex

        public void addUrlToTextIndex(String apiKey,
                     String url,
                     String index,
                     Map<String,Object> params,
                     IodJobCallback<AddToTextIndexResponse> callback)
                       throws IodErrorException
        Index a public accessible url into IDOL OnDemand
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        url - A publicly accessible url containing the document content
        index - The index to add to
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        callback - Callback that will be called with the response
        Throws:
        IodErrorException - If an error occurs indexing the documents

      • addReferenceToTextIndex

        public void addReferenceToTextIndex(String apiKey,
                           String reference,
                           String index,
                           Map<String,Object> params,
                           IodJobCallback<AddToTextIndexResponse> callback)
                             throws IodErrorException
        Index an object store object into IDOL OnDemand
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        reference - An object store reference pointing at a file to be used for document content
        index - The index to add to
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        callback - Callback that will be called with the response
        Throws:
        IodErrorException - If an error occurs indexing the documents

      • addFileToTextIndex

        public void addFileToTextIndex(String apiKey,
                      retrofit.mime.TypedOutput file,
                      String index,
                      Map<String,Object> params,
                      IodJobCallback<AddToTextIndexResponse> callback)
                        throws IodErrorException
        Index a file into IDOL OnDemand
        Parameters:
        apiKey - The API key to use to authenticate the request
        file - A file containing the content of the document
        index - The index to add to
        params - Additional parameters to be sent as part of the request
        callback - Callback that will be called with the response
        Throws:
        IodErrorException - If an error occurs indexing the documents
